TopicTitle: so, if i've got that right...

Articles.Content: will the 0.25 update include cargo bay parts? & fairings?
If anything, cargo bays. Fairings have not been announced and were not a part of SP+.
It will include the contents of the Spaceplane+ mod, with some small changes and differences.

If anything, cargo bays. Fairings have not been announced and were not a part of SP+.
It will include the contents of the Spaceplane+ mod, with some small changes and differences.

so there will be cargo bays, right?

Cargo bays are confirmed, and even more interestingly, Maxmaps has confirmed that parts enclosed in the bays will not generate drag in atmosphere, even in stock aero. While not quite the aero overhaul that is desired by some, it is definitely a step in that direction and towards fairings being useful in stock.

Cargo bays are confirmed, and even more interestingly, Maxmaps has confirmed that parts enclosed in the bays will not generate drag in atmosphere, even in stock aero. He also confirmed that this won't be in 0.25

max why you gotta play our hearts like this

Where? Not disagreeing, just wondering which media outlet I need to follow to get the info I missed. Hopefully not the wretched hive of scum and villainy Reddit.

Don't expect the module in 0.25 though. The more we dig the more we find regarding aerodynamics. Promising.

Maxmaps on Twitter
Nuts, one showed up in my Twitter feed but not the other. *Shakes fist at Twitter*

Maxmaps on Twitter

Actually this sounds even better. Maybe if Harvester is already at it ...

Actually2, I am more thrilled for the admin strategies and how they will work out in the end.

Looks like a reasonable place to ask this - did we get any hint of downward facing (aka bomb bay) cargo bay doors appearing in addition to the SP+ upward doors we (the "we" who've been playing with SP+ in anticipation) are used to? I vaguely recall some discussion earlier but not sure if this was confirmed or merely wished for.

Would be handy for landing a plane on the moon...

... opening doors and dropping a rover from it's tummy

Also - and I appreciate I'm just being greedy here - any circular 2.5m/1.25m cargo bays in the works for rockets? I'm assuming for 0.25 they'll be limited to the SP+ plane shaped ones.
...just rotate the regular cargo bays? Is there some reason that won't work?
The SP+ parts were reworked to be symmetric (not black on the bottom any more) so the one cargo bay will look fine either way up.

The SP+ parts were reworked to be symmetric (not black on the bottom any more) so the one cargo bay will look fine either way up.

Yay! Thanks for that Wasn't fussed about the colour but the shape being previously asymmetrical as well looked a bit off.

I wish they could steal some B9 code and make it have tweakables, like bay doors on bottom or top, fuels, etc.

Although from what I hear the devs and B9 fellow had a falling out and don't really talk much anymore. (confirm pls?)
